resources.string: Press the + button on the bottom left corner to create a new password settings database.
Add a new password settings database
Enter password to protect the new password settings database.

These protected (encrypted) password settings databases are locally stored on this device. Once you open a password settings database, you can export it (encrypted) to external apps such as message, email or a cloud storage service. Press the + button on the bottom left corner to create a new password settings database.
